H0.text: Which is the only sign of the Zodiac represented by an object, rather than a person or animal. Scorpio

H1.text: Which is the only sign of the Zodiac represented by an object, rather than a person or animal. Gemini

H2.text: Which is the only sign of the Zodiac represented by an object, rather than a person or animal. Taurus

H3.text: Which is the only sign of the Zodiac represented by an object, rather than a person or animal. Libra

A4.text: Libra is the only zodiac sign that is represented by an object; the other eleven signs are represented by either an animal or a mythological character though some depictions feature a man holding the scales with his hands.
